discussion.author: DilumAluthge
discussion.text: I would **very strongly** recommend a longer and more descriptive package name.

discussion.author: RGerzaguet
discussion.text:
Okay, so let's change the name.
Thanks for the feedback, this PR can be closed, I will resubmit with a new name.
